name: Michael
introduction:
my name is Michael L. Gordonâ€”a local aviation charter pilot for more than 30 years. I'm a graduate of Savage College in Columbus, Ohio. I studied social work in Boston and New England. You can learn more about me and meet some amazing people on the go.
I love to travel, bike, fish, talk to people, and enjoy the outdoors. Take a moment to follow me on Instagram, like my page, follow @limkorthe, and "like" me on Facebook.
